meanings.definition: Aloysius Lilius (c. 1510 – 1576) was an Italian doctor, astronomer and philosopher, and the primary author of what is now known as the Gregorian Calendar.
meanings.english_definition: Aloysius Lilius (c. 1510 – 1576) was an Italian doctor, astronomer and philosopher, and the primary author of what is now known as the Gregorian Calendar.
